Html:
Hi can you help please?

I have tried BibWord Extender
I assumed that a year suffix would automatically be added after the year "1996", so in this case it would be "1996a" and "1996b" respectively, in the following Harvard style references?

 

Refugee Council, 1996. The state of Asylum: A critique of asylum policy in the UK. The Refugee Council.

Refugee Council, 1996. Update: The impact of the social security regulations. The Refugee Council.

 


I've missed something or probably done something wrong, thanks

Have you followed the steps described in the usage section of the Extender tool (http://www.codeplex.com/bibliography/Wiki/View.aspx?title=BibWord%20Extender)? Make sure you update your citations and bibliography after you used the tool by selecting the style again in Word from the dropdown menu.

Thanks very much, it worked ok.

I think I didn't go through all the steps when I ran the extender before.
